2025-12-12.content:
We now [upgrade the tools used for deployments more frequently](https://docs.cloud.google.com/deploy/docs/select-tool-version).
This includes tools like Skaffold, Kubectl, and Helm. You can also
[select specific versions](https://docs.cloud.google.com/deploy/docs/select-tool-version#how_select) of these
tools when you create a release.

summary.title: Updated deployment tools available
summary.summary: We've updated the deployment tools used in Cloud Deploy, including Skaffold, Kubectl, and Helm, to more recent versions. You can now also select specific tool versions when creating a release, giving you greater control over your deployments.

2025-09-02.content: You can now use custom constraints with Organization Policy to provide more granular control over specific fields for some Cloud Deploy resources. For more information, see [Use custom organization policies](https://cloud.google.com/deploy/docs/custom-org-policy).

summary.title: Custom constraints in Cloud Deploy
summary.summary: Organization Policy now supports custom constraints for more granular control over Cloud Deploy resources.
